Package dev.project276.display

Class Display

java.lang.Object
dev.project276.display.Display
public class Display
extends java.lang.Object
The Display class. Contains the rendering code for drawing things to the screen. Contains the JFrame that we attach our KeyListener keyInput to. May need to implement the Runnable interface, if running this in its own thread is required.

    • render

      public void render​(Entity[][] gameBoard, java.util.ArrayList<Entity> entityList, int gameBoardCols, int gameBoardRows)
      Main render function. Makes calls to render the gameBoard, Entities, and UI.

    • showDeadScreen

      public void showDeadScreen​(java.awt.Graphics graphics)
      Draws the text that shows when the player's health is 0 or less.
      Parameters:
      graphics - The Graphics to draw the text onto.

    • showWinScreen

      public void showWinScreen​(java.awt.Graphics graphics)
      Draws the text that shows when the player exits the final level.
      Parameters:
      graphics - The Graphics to draw the text onto.

    • setGameInfo

      public void setGameInfo​(GameInfo gameInfo)
      Sets the GameInfo (ie level) of the Display. This Display will draw the parameter gameInfo in subsequent render() calls.
      Parameters:
      gameInfo - The GameInfo to set to.
